alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bergen and Rockland Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pearl River, or over Tappan, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tappan, Pearl River, Norwood, Orangeburg, Closter, Old Tappan, Blauvelt, Demarest, Harrington Park, Northvale, Piermont, Alpine, Rockleigh and Grand View-On-Hudson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
